Text.Page:
You know why they call it the "Desolate Coast?" Because nothing can live there anymore.

If it's fauna, the {@LinkCreature:12#9#Red Lash butchers} kill it for food. And if it's flora, the insatiable {@LinkCreature:12#11#island kamaras} eat it.

Clear that beach, ! Maybe it can return to some semblance of the pleasant seaside it used to be.

You cleared the beach by yourself? I wouldn't have thought it possible.

They'll be back, but somewhere on that beach, a seed is growing that wouldn't have made it except for you, .
